title: Boxplots and Five Number Summary: Golf - Is It a Sport?
question_text:
The boxplots below show the age of the members of two local golf organizations, The Fore-fathers and Tee-rific.
Which if the following statements is best supported by the boxplots?

choices.text: Although a five number summary is a quick way to analyze data, it is not able to indicate the range of a dataset.
Although a five number summary is a quick way to analyze data, it can hide characteristics such as gaps and clusters.
Although a five number summary is a quick way to analyze data, it can hide the Inter Quartile Range.
Although a five number summary is a quick way to analyze data, it cannot determine the difference between the median and maximum value.
A five number summary always provides enough information about a dataset that none of the above flaws apply.
